Title: SharePoint 2013 Client Side People Picker Demo
Description: SharePoint 2013 Client-Side People Picker Control How To Demo Basic Usage
HomeWiki:
Project Description

I recently put together a basic web part that made use SharePoint’s client-side People Picker control and was slightly surprised with how easy and straight forward it was. I hope that by sharing this others will also see how stress-free it can be to leverage the various SharePoint 2013 client-side controls.

A more detailed description of this project can be found on the AIS Blog.
